column4: wireless stopped workin on mylaptop on my wlan. it wont even show a list of wireless networks and 'enable wireless' is dimmed. any idea why?
I had a laptop that would do that, it turned out all that was needed was to push the wireless network card on/off switch
i dont have a wireless nic card on/off switch on my laptop afaik
I'm sorry, I don't know what else then :-(
